sys_ui_annotation.text:
A good prompt, or in this case the system message, is important to give the LLM.
There's a lot of ideas out there. The Dev Advocates where saying to use this RISEN method.
Include the following; Role, Instruction, Steps, Expectation, Narrowing. Read more

The Record Template syntax is very similar to email templates. If you use surround a field name with `{{}}` then we'll get the display value and put it in place.

There's some more advanced cases for related records and variables you can read about on the docs.

There's a lot of ideas out there.  The Dev Advocates where saying to use this RISEN method.  <br/>
Include the following; Role, Instruction, Steps, Expectation, Narrowing. <a href="https://www.servicenow.com/community/developer-advocate-blog/ai-academy-the-risen-framework/ba-p/2977866" target="_blank">Read more</a></text><type display_value="Info Box Blue">753f88a80f930000b12e6903cfe01206</type></sys_ui_annotation><sys_ui_annotation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><is_plain_text>false</is_plain_text><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-01-11 06:13:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>7ad7859d838796104adbe970deaad30b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-01-11 06:13:33</sys_updated_on><text>The Record Template syntax is very similar to email templates.  If you use surround a field name with `{{}}` then we'll get the display value and put it in place.<br/><br/>
There's some more advanced cases for related records and variables you can read about on the <a href="https://tryaiinabox.com/docs/summarizer#sytnax">docs</a>.</text><type display_value="Info Box
